services.title: Caching
services.description: Caching, leveraging tools like Redis, accelerates access to files by storing copies in a temporary location, enhancing retrieval speed.

services.title: Logging
services.description: EFK(elasticsearch , fluentd, kibana) stack aggregates logs from hosts and applications which can be visualized in Kibana.

services.title: Messaging
services.description: Apache Kafka, a distributed streaming platform, facilitates real time message publishing and subscribing, enabling robust data streaming infrastructure.

services.title: Secret Management
services.description: Vault, a secure tool for secret management, enables developers to securely store and dynamically generate sensitive data like passwords and tokens.

services.title: Encryption-Decryption
services.description: UbiQ facilitates secure data transfer between sources through encryption and decryption processes.

services.title: License Management
services.description: KeyGen, part of License Management service, generates unique license keys for software to enable controlled access and usage based on authorized permissions and terms.

services.title: Alarm Management
services.description: Alarm Management is a service that centralizes the storage of alarms originating from various sources and of different severity levels.

services.title: Distributed Tracing
services.description: Jaeger is an open-source distributed tracing system used for monitoring and troubleshooting microservices-based architectures.

services.title: Policy Engine
services.description: A policy engine is a software component that enforces rules or policies within a system or application.

services.title: Metrics Engine
services.description: A metrics engine is a tool that collects and analyzes data to generate performance indicators and insights, aiding in decision-making and optimization processes.

services.title: Backup and Restore
services.description: Backup and restore is a data management process where copies of important files or systems are made to protect against data loss.

services.title: Notification
services.description: Notifications are alerts or messages sent to users to inform them about relevant events, updates, or actions within a system or application.

services.title: Configuration Management
services.description: Configuration Management is the process of systematically handling changes to a system's configuration in a way that maintains integrity over time

services.title: Workflow Engine
services.description: A workflow engine is a software tool that automates and manages the flow of tasks, data, and processes within an organization, streamlining operations and improving efficiency.

services.title: Kube State Metrics
services.description: Kube State Metrics is a Prometheus exporter that provides metrics about the state of Kubernetes clusters.

services.title: Log Shipper
services.description: A log shipper for Kubernetes pods collects and forwards logs generated by pod containers to a centralized location for storage, monitoring, and analysis.

services.title: Apache Storm
services.description: Apache Storm provides real - time stream processing capabilities for analyzing and processing Kubernetes logs at scale.

services.title: Katana Slice Manager
services.description: Katana Slice Manager is a tool for orchestrating and managing resource allocation and workload distribution within a Kubernetes cluster, optimizing performance and resource utilization.

services.title: TOSCA Orchestartor
services.description: TOSCA Orchestration is a tool for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of complex applications using the TOSCA standard.

services.title: IPAM
services.description: IP Address Management (IPAM) is a system for planning, tracking, and managing IP addresses on a network to ensure efficient and organized allocation.

services.title: Application LCM
services.description: ALM is the process of managing the entire lifecycle of an application, from its initial planning and development through deployment, maintenance, and eventual retirement.

services.title: NFV Orchestrator Service
services.description: NFV Orchestrator Service is a component of NFV that manages the deployment, scaling, and orchestration of VNFs within a network infrastructure.

services.title: Istio
services.description: Istio is an open-source service mesh platform that enables you to connect, secure, and manage microservices across a distributed system.

services.title: Edge Proxy (Envoy)
services.description: Envoy is a high-performance edge proxy and communication bus designed for cloud-native applications, providing advanced load balancing, observability, and security features.

services.title: Vitess
services.description: Vitess is an open-source database clustering system for horizontal scaling of MySQL through sharding, providing features like automatic sharding and transparent failover.
